description:
Heiress to the vastly influential Schnee Dust Company (or S.D.C.).
Weiss is confident in her abilities and often has a frigid & formal approach towards the people around her. But, after getting to know Ruby and her other teammates, she learns to be more receptive. Thus becoming a better team player and friend.
She has a hatred for the White Fang, which has long targeted her relatives & company as targets of their terrorism.
Source: Official site
name: Weiss Schnee
